item.title: Overhanging tree outside 51 Hazel Way, Lobleys Drive, 11th August
item.description:
Hi! The tree outside my property 51 Hazel Way, Lobleys Drive, GL3 4gl is overhanging my property considerably and is within 1m of touching the walls. Please can it be cut back before storms cause damage to my property? Many thanks.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lobleys Drive, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Subject: Hedge on Winterbottom Road – urgent request for trimming, 11th August
item.description:
Subject: Hedge on Winterbottom Road – urgent request for trimming Dear Sir or Madam, I am a resident of Winterbottom Road in Cheltenham. I am writing regarding the hedge located next to your school, which has not been trimmed for a long time. The hedge extends significantly onto the road, causing serious safety concerns: Two vehicles cannot pass safely at the same time, Drivers must be very cautious to avoid damage to their vehicles, Car wing mirrors are being scratched or hit by branches. Please trim the hedge urgently and ensure regular maintenance to prevent the problem from recurring. Thank you in advance for your attention, and I look forward to a swift resolution. Kind regards, Krystian Grzegorzewski Resident of Winterbottom Road
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 30, Winterbotham Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
